sitename: Kansas City Integrative Health | Functional & Holistic Health Specialists. Located in the Heart of Overland Park
cleaned_text: Detoxification Transformation Every person has unique metabolic obstacles that may prevent optimal elimination of environmental toxins. The good news is there are things we can do to help lower your toxic body burden and keep yourself in the best health possible. This detoxification program is beneficial in many ways, and therefore can help a wide variety of health concerns. It is ideal for those with: [Low energy](/fatigued-to-fantastic) - Brain fog and memory loss - Inability to lose weight - Weak immune system - PMS and other [women's health issues](/womens-health) - Skin disorders (eczema, acne, - Chronic fatigue [High blood pressure](/heart-disease) What does this program consist of? As with all of the treatments we provide at Kansas City Integrative Health, your detoxification program will be tailored to your individual needs. When you begin treatment, testing may or may not be done to examine all of your health conditions and needs, and it will be finalized to address your specific health goals.
